koohiiStory1: [tender; weakness; gentleness; softness] Love me tender, Love me perfect, Never cheat on me. Or I´ll impale you on my Halberd, And hang ya atop a tree...
koohiiStory2: Use a halberd to tenderize a tree: halberds can chop, poke, and slash, so it´s all good!
kunYomi: やわ.らか、やわ.らかい、やわ、やわ.ら
readingExamples: 柔軟 (じゅうなん), 柔道 (じゅうどう), 懐柔 (かいじゅう), 柔らか (やわ.らか), 柔らかい (やわ.らかい)
words:
柔軟(じゅうなん): flexible, lithe
柔道(じゅうどう): judo
柔らかい(やわらかい): soft
